Rafael is only a man who's committed to it.
♪ Raphael's got the most attitude on the team ♪

This young artist lived and worked in San Martin de los Andes, Neuquen Prefectual and today is based in Merlo, San Luis. Last year he came to San Rafael and captured the beauty of the land and its peasants in works worthy of admiration.
Michelangelo wouldn't let anyone in there while he was at work but Bramante had the key and, one day, when Michelangelo was away, he took Raphael in with him.
The district of Punta del Agua is located 146 km from the city of San Rafael and 80 km from General Alvear. It is located […]
